labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Screensharing and call starts to disconnect, has trouble re-establishing screenshar.
data.expected_result: Nothing, screensharing should continue as normal
data.short_description: Scrolling through other DMs while screensharing ends the call and screensharing
data.steps_to_repro: - Start screensharing with someone (desktop or window-only, doesn't matter) - Go to another DM and scroll up for a bit (until it starts loading previous messages) - Notice how the call breaks and screensharing tries to reload but honestly can't unless you restart the call
